mapper.select: SELECT u.ID,FIRST_NAME,LAST_NAME,EMAIL_ID,MOBILE_NUMBER , rm.ROLE_NAME , ra.ACL_NAME as ACL_NAME , c.CLIENT_NAME,c.PAN,c.WEBSITE FROM USER u LEFT JOIN CLIENT c ON c.ID = u.CLIENT_ID LEFT JOIN ROLES r ON r.USER_ID =u.ID LEFT JOIN ROLE_MASTER rm ON rm.ID=r.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN ROLE_ACLS ra ON ra.ROLE_ID = rm.ID where u.CLIENT_ID=#{clientId}
